assumption: TargetCo is fully integrated into ParentCo's infrastructure with no standalone systems
basis: All infrastructure domains (cloud, network, identity, security) are listed as "ParentCo" owned, and TargetCo operates as a business unit within ParentCo with shared ERP/CRM/HCM platforms
validation_needed: Detailed infrastructure dependency mapping and shared service inventory

assumption: TargetCo workloads are primarily in Azure cloud given ParentCo Azure AD usage
basis: ParentCo uses Azure AD for identity, and BuyerCo is Azure-primary, suggesting cloud alignment
validation_needed: Confirm actual workload placement - could be hybrid or multi-cloud

assumption: SaaS applications (45 for TargetCo, 60 for BuyerCo) will require license consolidation and user migration
basis: Both entities have significant SaaS footprints that likely have overlapping applications requiring consolidation
validation_needed: SaaS application inventory comparison and license audit

assumption: TargetCo network infrastructure is fully integrated with ParentCo and requires complete separation
basis: Documents clearly state ParentCo owns network infrastructure and TargetCo operates as business unit within ParentCo environment
validation_needed: Network architecture review to confirm level of integration and shared infrastructure

assumption: IP address conflicts likely exist between ParentCo and BuyerCo networks
basis: Both environments are enterprise-scale (650+ and 1200+ users respectively) and likely use common RFC1918 ranges like 10.x.x.x which have high conflict probability
validation_needed: IP address scheme documentation from both environments

assumption: TargetCo will need complete IAM separation from ParentCo Azure AD tenant
basis: Document states all identity services provided through ParentCo-owned Azure AD tenant, and buyer has separate Azure AD environment
validation_needed: Confirm ParentCo will not provide ongoing IAM services post-acquisition

assumption: All security tooling and monitoring will need to be replaced or migrated
basis: Document indicates all cybersecurity operations are centrally managed by ParentCo with no independent security tooling
validation_needed: Confirm ParentCo will not provide ongoing security services post-close
